home.headline: Web Developer and Open Source Contributor
home.subline: I'm Anuj, Sophomore at VIPS doing my undergrad in AI & DS, where I am learning about Artificial Intelligence & Dat Science. After hours, I build my own projects and love to contribute to Open Source.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Anuj is a 2nd Year undergrad at VIPS, pursuing B-Tech in Aritificial Intelligence and Data Science. His Tech Stacks are Based on Typescript and JavaScript. He loves to Contribute to Open Source.

Layer5.achievements: Improved UI/UX by developing new components using Next.js and Tailwind CSS. Implemented automation scripts in Node.js to optimize the build process.;Refactored many Key components from class-based to functional components, ensuring compatibility with MUI v5 and modern React practices.

Kiwix.achievements: odified content extraction logic to filter brief descriptions from popovers in Wikivoyage ZIM files, improving the accuracy and user experience.

Taipy.achievements: Improved JSON data visualization by adding collapsibility and syntax highlighting in DataNodeViewer, and implemented unit tests to ensure reliable styling and functionality for table utilities; Enhanced UI consistency by resolving styling issues and added unique CSS classes for customizable column headers.

Vivekananda Institute of Professional St.description: Bachelor's in Artificial Intelligence & Data Science.
